kpi.name: LTE_670a

kpi_info.title: INB VLAN Intf EF PHB DV
kpi_info.use: Data Volume Received by the interface, including framing characters, using Expedited Forwarding PHB class. The KPI is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN interface of the BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: INB VLAN Intf EF PHB DV
